cause.description:
Helping everyone on earth to party bacause somewhere... someplace... people aren't as fortunate as us... so why not enbrace it and enjoy it...
1. The sitting at home doing nothing on a Friday night... IS UNACCEPTABLE!!!
2. The sitting at home watching tv on a Saturday night... Must STOP
3. Enjoy the weekends while we still can coz one day we gonna be too old to do anything
cause.mission: Help everyone on earth to learn how to party
cause.name: Partying is life!!!
